title: Pose2Caption: Advanced Pose Understanding System
author: [Izza Farhat (222k-4120) & Khadeeja Haider (22k-4077)]
use-case: It's a use-case as a comprehensive system for human pose understanding through natural language generation, e.g Exercise Type - squat, pushup, yoga

components.pose_detection: Multi-modal detection using MediaPipe (body, hands, face)
components.feature_extraction: Biomechanical analysis of joint angles and body symmetry
components.feedback_systems: Professional fitness and yoga assessment modules
components.evaluation: Automated metrics (BLEU, ROUGE) and simulated human evaluation

limitations: Performance depends on input image quality
future_work: Integration with LLMs for richer descriptions
